import React, { useState } from "react"; // Sample hotel data const hotels = [ { city: "Paris, France", image: "/images/paris.jpg" }, { city: "Budapest, Hungary", image: "/images/budapest.jpg" }, { city: "New York, USA", image: "/images/newyork.jpg" }, { city: "Rome, Italy", image: "/images/rome.jpg" }, { city: "Berlin, Germany", image: "/images/berlin.jpg" }, { city: "Stockholm, Sweden", image: "/images/stockholm.jpg" }, ]; const hotel = { name: "Luxury Resort", location: "Maldives", images: [ "/images/hotel-main.jpg", "/images/hotel-rooms.jpg", "/images/hotel-amenities.jpg", ], description: "Experience the epitome of luxury at Luxury Resort. Unwind by the beach, indulge in world-class amenities, and enjoy a stay filled with unforgettable moments.", amenities: [ "Free Wi-Fi", "Spa Services", "Infinity Pool", "Beachfront", "Fitness Center", "Room Service", ], rooms: [ { type: "Single Room", price: "$150 per night", available: true, description: "A cozy single room with a beautiful ocean view. Perfect for solo travelers.", images: ["/images/room1.jpg"], }, { type: "Double Room", price: "$250 per night", available: true, description: "A spacious room with a balcony and stunning beach views. Ideal for couples.", images: ["/images/room2.jpg"], }, { type: "Suite", price: "$450 per night", available: false, description: "Luxurious suite with a private pool and panoramic views. For those looking for ultimate comfort.", images: ["/images/room3.jpg"], }, ], }; const HotelPage = () => { const [selectedRoom, setSelectedRoom] = useState(null); const [checkInDate, setCheckInDate] = useState(""); const [checkOutDate, setCheckOutDate] = useState(""); const [guests, setGuests] = useState(1); const [promoCode, setPromoCode] = useState(""); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(""); const handleRoomSelect = (room) => { setSelectedRoom(room); }; const handleBooking = () => { alert("Booking Successful!"); }; return (

{hotel.location}

{hotel.description}

{/* Search Bar */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} />

{hotel.rooms.map((room, index) => (

{room.type}

{room.description}

{room.price}

{room.available ? ( ) : ( Not Available )}
))}
{/* Booking Section */} {selectedRoom && (

Book Your Stay

Room Rate: {selectedRoom.price} x {guests} guests

Total: ${parseFloat(selectedRoom.price.replace('$', '')) * guests}

)} {/* Promotional Section */}

Sign up now and enjoy a 10% discount on your first booking. Itâ€™s easy and fast!

); }; export default HotelPage;
